hotels.name: Glenmarie Hotel & Golf Resort
hotels.address: Jalan Usahawan U1/8, Petaling Jaya, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 40250

reviews.review_comment: Room was normal, old building. But spacious

The room is very smelly and dirty due to carpet, the bed is very very comfortable! The interior is very oldschool i dont like it, atleast upgrade it the room itself are expensive. Pls do something about your staff very rude esp from the front desk
Room 542, the bed was sunk in on the right side. Please do not offer future customers this room until the mattress is changed. Left side bed side lamp was not working.
I wanted to change room and the staff accomodated it
ok
Good for staycation
Hotel and agoda should get along smoothly.. I booked with breakfast but Hotel told me opposite

Overall it was just okay. BUT the breakfast buffet was amazing. It’s an old hotel so do not expect anything great- thus the corridors to the rooms could be somewhat creepy :\ One of the rooms I stayed in has a leakage at its bidet hose bit i hope it’s fixed. I communicated with one of the Glen Cafe’s staff and she wasnt really helpful as her answers for my questions was all jumbled up. Overall, i’d say 3/5.
The breakfast was so delicious. The room was spacious. I got a room with a view of the golf field. it is so refreshing. The bed is too fluffy. The feeling cannot get you up from your sleep.
Not my 1st time stay here.. I love this hotel.. Golf view... pleasant to stay here.. Breakfast nice, variety choice.. Hi-tea was great... Overall awesome 👍👍👍

Pro - Plenty of parking spaces, nice golf course view from the room, good breakfast, clean Cons - Checking in was so slow, they can’t even see that my booking was inclusive of breakfast; once inquired then only they checked. Hotel are showing sign of wear and tear. Carpet in the room should be changed - it causing the room to smell. Mattress and pillow are too soft we have body ached the next day

The facilities in this hotel are great. It's a perfect spot for a golf lover and for travelers who love privacy. But due to that high privacy and also lack of accountability, I lost a few hundred bucks when I forgot to turn off my car emergency signal and had to buy for a new car battery. I admit it was my fault but if there's a staff that did notice and find me, this would not have happened. They simply let the guests park their cars in their premise with very few accountability to protect them from any loss. This is a simple thing even though they have notify this at their parking space, a simple help could mean a lot. No one noticed this. Not even the security guards whose post was quite near to the parking space.
Great location. We really loved the character of the hotel. The restaurant was fantastic and staff was friendly and helpful.
hotel lama and perabot lama tapi bila buka view golf sangat tenang and gelap takde pengcahayaan waktu malam
great environment
Good and friendly staff. Good buffet breakfast

reviews.review_title: Peaceful place to chill and unwind”
reviews.review_comment: Clean, spacious (super spacious!) room (we stayed in executive suite. Feels like home and good food for the breakfast too. Overall, it was a pleasant stay.
May repeat

The room has a smell, dono how to describe but a smell that feels uncomfortable. The view is nice and can see the bedsheet, pillow, and blanket are new and clean. this is the most satisfying part. ONE MORE THING, I NOTICE A LOT OF PEOPLE DIN WEAR MASK AND HANGING OUTSIDE. NOT SURE THEY ARE HOTEL STAFF OR CUSTOMERS. BUT VERY SURE THEY ARE NOT GOLFERS. COZ THEY HAVE FORMAL WEAR. THEY TAKE CIGARETTES OR PLAY CIGARETTES OUTSIDE. Very irresponsible.
clean and good environment, facilities maybe a bit old but still ok.
clean and helpful staff
Pilih bilik yg menghadapi golf course..

Booking thro’ Agoda on the same day I check in. Check in was smooth.. nice room facing the golf course.. Breakfast was good with good spread of dishes.. No problem for car park since there are pelnty of parking lot and free too
The aircond is not working and need to change to another room.. the first room got a goof view of the golf field and pool but the new room only can see the roof of the hotel..
Definitely come back soon.
Hotel is nice good and clean. Breakfast not included however there is restaurant nearby few minutes driving.

reviews.review_title: Everything is ok except freshness of the room”
reviews.review_comment: You have great staffs and good facilities but need to improve on odour of the room, maybe because this is old hotel. Otherwise i will give 10/10
Room is large and nice,
A place where mind was blowing indeed place so cosy and had such a great experience and fantastic view i definitely will make a visit again in future
Good breakfast, very relaxing surrounding and friendly staffs

reviews.review_title: Bad Room and Not garden view ”
reviews.review_comment: Bad room with bad shower hot water, toilet door auto open itself randomly. Thought get good garden view but is facing rooftop. Only good is WiFi. like 3 star standard
The staffs are very professional and helpful. The location and scenery from the room is great.
Never accept the room numbered 330 so awkward infront of the lift
air con is cool.
I just have 1 comment.. on that day I arrived at the hotel at 3pm and the queue for check in very long and i was only able to check in and go to my room at 5pm
I’m staying less than 30km than this hotel but my family and I still love to go to this place.. from the hotel itself to staff and food everything is good… definitely going come again..
Away from town hustle and bustle

Overall, this hotel is decent enough for family to stay with their facilities including big swimming pool and variety of food for breakfast. My only concern is about the carpet in the room seems not clean enough which can trap a lot of dust.
This resort is good value for money and good choice for "staycation". Most rooms are facing the gold course with lots of greens. You can relax and have short stay here.
Everything good ❤️
The room a little bit old fashion. Toilet door is broken. Breakfast is so so.

Time check in tk smooth,kena perbaiki lg.. furniture bilik lama especially tandas air bertangkung di lantai.. Aircond bilik best,sejuk..katil empuk..parking kereta tkde bumbung.. breakfast kena perbagaikan menu...overall bole la..

We are actually just need a set of cutlery. No one answered the call from room at first.Fine, we go reception there and staff say we need to call housekeeping for cutlery. At last, after more than5 call for each housekeeping and reception. We got a reply that housekeeping are not working and no one is responsible on guest request just for a set of cutlery. Restaurant also stated 10pm closed but 9:12pm already said close.
1. Love the spacious room 2. Breakfast so delicious. This one I gave 10 star 3. Swimming Pool good & safe for kids Overall awesome...definitely will repeat again
To me the hotel everything is good. No problem at all. But only my concern when to check in at the reception too slow!! Need to improve more easy and fastest way 👍🏻
Good place to spend a weekend with the love one.
Check in at 4.30pm..1 hr 30mins waiting for the room to be ready. But overall is marvelous. The room is clean.
worth it for a vacation
All great
Probably newly opened back to public. Room was musty
Convenient and comfortable
Bilik bersih
Pros-Fantastic view of golf course..Big room..for the money i paid really great deal.. Cons-Swimming pool not that big,parking space can be better.. Overall recommended 👍

reviews.review_title: Best place to be relax with family”
reviews.review_comment: Friendly staff, greeny environment, peaceful, best place to relax from your busy city life

Check in and checkout process is fast, but sadly, they did not change the bed linen etc. I was upset to see my bed linen got few blood spots. Called receptionist using the hotel telephhone but cannot reachable. I had to call using my own cellular. The hotel got big window and its not clean. I also can see bird pop. I hope the hotel will take initiative to clean the window and bird poop. Food is okay.

Receptionist was not friendly at all, he was probably tired. Our room smelled mouldy and old. There wasn’t any hot water for the shower, it was lukewarm at best. I also got bitten by bed bugs during my stay here. My sister forgot and left her stuff in our room, but when we called the hotel, they said the stuff couldn’t be found - weird, because we just left the hotel less than 6 hours. The breakfast was alright not bad, got many choices from unlimited coffee to very delicious nasi lemak. But the hall was too crowded, probably because it was during the weekend - so we had to sit outside which I didn’t mind. Overall, we enjoyed our stay here but I feel some improvements can be done.
Tasty breakfast provided with many of choice . clean room and good in room facilities such as hairblow, iron etc
very good
Nice
Comfortable and clean

Had paid for extra bed but the receptionist didn't arrange for it, went down to reception (because no one answer the call) several times, waited for more than 4 hours only they deliver the extra bed to us. Booked for connecting room but the door in between was locked, had requested to open for many times but the receptionist keep telling us someone will attend to us soon until 9.30pm being told that the person in charge of the key for the door had clocked out.
Good
Nice for staycation. Highly recommended. Food are very nice even not so many choices.
Big room
the building is very old and mouldy. The moment I stepped into the room the room looks old and creepy and I couldn't sleep well.
Nice view ..from the room .. Big room..but our room phone problm. Big bed.
Check in was smooth.. Room was clean, great golf course view and big king size bed. Breakfast was lavish and tasty.. Will stay here again

I had a pleasant stay here. My room was overlooking the course, it’s so pretty. The bed was so comfortable and everything was good except from this one foul smell in the room. Not sure whether it’s from the carpet of cupboard. But it got stronger when sejuk. Apart from that, everything was good.

Agoda reviewed wrong description of the room on the website and hence misled my booking decision. Nevertheless, hotel management has given me a free upgrade to a room with balcony. I must give a thumbs up
Variety of foods. Swimming pool
Good
The staying was awesome
Bad experience, after we stay one night on 11 Dec. Then 12 Dec Mysejatera turn yellow colour (casual contact) .. Think before you book this hotel.
1) break out plug 2) poor lighting in the room 3) badan gatal2 tido pakai cadar
Good hotel
very nice place.
The bed is nice, food delicious, near to shopping area
Privacy yet easy access. Very nice for family and business trip
Registered at counter at 230pm...room available and ready by 4.30pm
Murah n berbaloi for 1 night stay. Kids boleh main pool lama kalau x ramai org. Kalau x mmg limit sejam utk 1 family. Bilik bersih, lantai xberhabuk. Will repeat next!
Staff very friendly and helpful
Overall the deal was great. May not hesitate to return

Came here with my kids. The size of the room can be credited, enough for 5 people. However, the cleanliness of the room can be questioned. The carpet looks dirty and we can clearly notice small dust here and there in the room. Other than that, this hotel is great for a short staycation.

Had the best experienced during our stay. Staff are all friendly especially one male staff named muzaffar or mustaffa if i’m not mistaken. Would gladly to be served by him again in future. Breakfast were not that variety but the food were good.
i love this hotel🥰 everything is ok 👍

Clean & tidy room, friendly staff and delicious breakfast. Overall stay was pleasant, and do take note since affected by Covid, they have restricted some facilities in the room. therefore, if you need to use robe, laundry bag u need to ring the counter to provide it. and for Muslim traveler to, they didn't provide any praying mat (sejadah) in the room. No worries, definitely a worth stay, waking up to such a scenery of golf field watching the sun rise, such a refreshing view I would say.

reviews.review_title: Great place but rooms are very old.”
reviews.review_comment: The aircond wasn't great and the room had a musty smell. The interior was extremely dated and this is a suite we're talking about!
Great location if your around Damasara for work trips
Laundry bag not provided. Not so many activities for children. The room is quite gloomy

reviews.review_title: EXCUTIVE DELUXE KING SUITE WAS DISPOINTING EXPRIENCE”
reviews.review_comment: I BOOK SUITE EXCUTIVE KING DELUXE ,BUT VERY POOR ROOM, I CAN SEE A DUST, TAHI CICAK. THE HOTEL SLIPPER ALSO BROKEN, MIGHT BE TOO LONG NOT USING THAT ROOM, CLEANER DOESNOT CHECK PROPERLY. THE CARPET ALSO NEED TO CHANGE NEW,BAD ODOUR AND NOT SUITABLE FOR YOUNG KIDS TO STAY SINCE HAD A BAD ODOUR. WILL NOT COME AGAIN.PAY FOR NOTHING
Spacious
Good place to stay. The place is quiet old.

Stay was good had an upgrade room. Everything was all good close to perfect. The only draw back I have called more then 20 times and I still could not get hold of room service. There is no room service menu in the room which I think there should improve here

reviews.review_title: 太可怕了，什么 5星级酒店！！！”
reviews.review_comment: The room smeeled of musty and not clean, the room has not been refurbished, There are also ants at the table area, Water will seep out from the ground or the floor, the design is old, food not good only have egg.... No chicken or others alse, not good at all! Can not sleep will! Not recommended this hotel, I will not go again and isn't not worth the price!
Good Place for short getaways

Only ~20 minutes away from the center of the city but you already got the feeling of 'out of the city'. At first, we got a low floor room with a roof view even though we had already requested for high floor and it said garden view on the listing. So we asked the staff for a room change and they gave us a nice high floor room with a golf garden view. The room was clean, AC working fine and the breakfast was decent. The swimming pool is small, I think it is only suitable for children. But overall it was a good stay and worth the price.

New owner but need improvement fast. No wifi. Food getting worst compared to last owner. Rooms - smelly and need upgrade. aircond - cannot control. Only coffee - no tea except green tea. staff - not friendly. Need to improve fast.
nice
Why not check-in here. The food is marvellous
Great view from the hotel room.

hotels.name: WOLO Kuala Lumpur
hotels.address: Jln Sultan Ismail, Bukit Bintang, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 55100

reviews.review_comment: Design is superb, modern nice view. Cleanliness is not so good, they always left out amenities. No shoes, no toothbrush and you need to request from reception. Bed is comfortable

They prioritised design and decent quality in the facades of everything. This is a hotel that looks good, feels good and has some frills that other hotels this price won’t have. Like a coffee Nespresso machine, TWG tea bags and good pillows, mattress and quilt. Extra cold room without windows and shower pressure is strong, hot and consistent. Staff is B rating but in a good way meaning they didn’t do anything unpalatable, but they also wont do anything super awesome. You know what I mean? Just basics average in that department which is fine because location is the best of the best. I will stay here again for sure.
Found a bit dusty on top of cabinet. Overall is good.
Very clean and well equipped hotel at a prime location in KL. Will definitely visit again!
very nice location in kl city

Honestly the hotel is very great in design & operate by great staff. even the door security. High quality bfast & very nice bed + super view. But if you are easy wake person...not recommend to stay there as you able heard very clear vehicle noise at nite. Quit suffer if you ale heard silly noise vehicle pass the street. Secondly, the basin was inside the room. meaning you may wake your partner if you go toilet, shower or wash your hand. OVERALL, is a good hotel with nice design.
i happy with the stay BUT please look after jockey parking, they were trying to charge me double of the price which i park less then a day(24 hour).
Everything good. Except guests have to park at Lot 10 (Rm15) and cross one road to Wolo Hotel.
center of KL

All are perfect but I didn’t have my buffet breakfast. Instead they send breakfast to room. Limited food selection and I was rather disappointed. I was looking forward for my American buffet style to enjoy the start of the day. But I didn’t get to enjoy that. Quite disappointed.
Bed is comfortable, location is superb, but lack of manpower. The reception is slow, always did not answer phone, everything is slow. Bell boy service is good
I liked the vibes of the place and also all over you have music and the rooms are super clean and cool I really recommend it to people who wants spend some private time
Definitely come back! Nice room, nice view

I like the design of the hotel room but the room is too dark and doesn’t have daylight. It is not convenient for girl who need make up, like im makeup in the dark and cant see clearly. Overall it’s a nice hotel to stay
The hotel's design is very unique, best location ever, opposite Monorail station. Room is small but compact, i like the idea of separate shower and toilet

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel but lack of staff ”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel itself is strategically located at prime area, nice hotel view, nice room, comfortable bed. Breakfast is also carte, sent to room. Security guard service is very good. Reception is very slow, called reception always no answer. Service is slow. The management should really look into this. Check in is also slow. Everything at the reception is slow.
Acoustic can be improve

Glad to revisit this place after 2years MCO overseas. Having stayed at this hotel in 2018 allow us to notice the difference. No more welcome drinks at the top level penthouse- Mr. Chew’s Chino Latino Bar and room decoration is not as tidy as before. Overall experience is still fine, it reminiscent of the happy moment in Kuala Lumpur.
best location. best facilities. the room is not that big for the price but the design is so fancy and expensive. would love to repeat again.
good
This is my second experience staying in this hotel,very praised clean hotel,staff and front reception are service friendly,will be back again for next time.

reviews.review_title: So far best I have stayed in KL”
reviews.review_comment: Absolutely recommend, the pillow and bed is among best I have stayed before

reviews.review_title: nice room with a very modern design”
reviews.review_comment: please choose room with the window. it's a great experience in here.

Best, location strategic, beside mrt, with nespresso coffee machine n refrigerator, streetview for bath room, can close the curtain if dun want to have night view, double curtain in badroom preent sunlight falling in, nice bed, nice smell, excellent service, the bad side is dont have free parking, need to park at lot 10 with rm15 per entry, after check out got 48 hrs to take ur car
A place to stay, best everythings.
Will give a thousand LIKEs to this hotel to stay, no regard, worth money best location and etc.
Can park at Lot 10 for Rm 15 per day
so unique, the best in city centre.
I like this hotel. And also my son 1 years plus enjoy the room. Haha. Very clean and good location also. Staff very helpful and friendly.
I like this hotel. And also my son 1 years plus enjoy the room. Haha. Very clean and good location also. Staff very helpful and friendly. We will come again and again next time. Hehe
Excellent service and excellent location
Location👍👍
love staying in here. definitely will stay again very soon
Awesome experience for staying at this hotel
Parking was a hassle, u need to use the valet services to park your car or you can park at nearby parking spaces. Other than that, everything was perfect!
Great place for staycation

Location & rooms were nice, check-in not so smooth as I have to wait the room that I wanted on the high floor, not as quite as I thought its going to be I can still here some noise from the road. Breakfast not recommended but they were ok for me. MRT just out of the hotel door very convenient. I do like the room newly renovated.
Room is cosy,Wil stay again
Will coming back again for my next trip

In term of rate for this hospitality as well as the central location of tourist visiting places, WOLO Bukit Bintang stand as the great Hotel among all. You can easily access to Bukit Bintang famous shopping center and MRT/Monorail easily. * the bad thing was - reception told me additional of drinking water need charge RM2 per bottle. - if WOLO Hotel could change this rule. Then you will be 5/5

Sound proof is bed, you can hear outside corridor after 12am still noisy and car sound because downstairs is traffic light. Shopping Mall is around you like Pavilion, Lot 10 and etc, Mrt and Monorail Station at outside hotel building only just 1min. Easy to re
Convenient and affordable
Clean and trendy. A modern and simple room. Just nice.

Really love the whole concept of the hotel.. sometime simple is just beautiful.. small but comfortable..modern design and unique in it's on way ..starbuck reserve at the lobby is a definate plus point to the place.. good job WOLO
Opposite Lot 10 Shopping mall dont have carpark

Love the night city view from here, the hotel did good on sound proof despite being in the center of the most happening area in Bukit Bintang. Recommended for couples! Not advisable to stay if you have your own car here, because the hotel does not have its own parking & you have to park at Lot10 or Fahrenheit (RM15/night) and carry your luggage across the busy shopping street. Instead, you can take MRT; the lobby is right in front of Gate 2 MRT Bukit Bintang. Overall very good experience!
good service

I brought some food out side, but the hotel don't lend me a fork and spoon instead the reception said we don't have that sir! I do believe they have the cafe / restaurant but not sure why... But I still recommend and came again to this hotel but with my on cutlery. Reception please smile when the guest arrived at the hotel they look stressful. Small things can make a difference. Thanks.
Comfortable
Must have a try
great but no carpark
Most valued hotel and comfort place to stay. Nearby shopping mall and easy to shopping!
I like it

This is the second time I've stayed at this hotel. The room was fairly lovely and soundproof, and I attempted to call the hotel to get a pillow, but it was out of stock. The room was quite comfy and clean. Every item in the room is truly available for purchase from the hotel. The hotel is close to Pavillion and directly across from Lot10 mall. We can only park in Lot10 because this hotel does not have a parking lot. If I want to go shopping in the area, I would highly recommend it.
Very professional, polite and cordial. They are doing a great job.
Best!
I LOVE IT SO MUCH!!!

If you like shopping eating or drinking this location is superb. Pavilion, changkst and jalan Alor is nearby. Hotel design is great. Bed is comfortable. Bathroom shower is great, refreshing. BreAkfast is bad.
Bed is super comfortable, location is superb. Shower is great too! Just the cleanliness I would rate 6/10. Design is great. Parking I would recommend valet which is rm30

reviews.review_title: In the heart of Bukit Bintang”
reviews.review_comment: If you're looking for the best location to stay at then this is it. A modern artsy luxury hotel located just next to MRT and monorail stations, and all the iconic attractions in Bukit Bintang like Pavilion, Lot 10, and Changkat.
check in counter very slow and room not yet prepared
Check in counter very slow
Everything is nice but the 'check in' is so in slow motion.
I travel to KL every year. Wolo always my first choice. Love the room and location.

reviews.review_title: Location wise ok, but staff service not so good”
reviews.review_comment: I stayed for 2D1N, during the first day i called grab for food delivery but the restaurant didn't prepare enough cutlery so i tried to reception, concierge or even room service but no one pick up call. End up i need to share use cutlery with my partner. 2nd, i already filled up the form for next day morning breakfast during my checkins time. The breakfast i wish to delivery second session which is 9-930am however the staff already ring my door during 830am. Helloooo, frustrated. 3rd, the hotel prepare one set toothbrush only for King size room. You expect both of us share one toothbrush!?? Other then that overall ok
The Room is comfortable with bluetooth speaker and Nespresso Coffee Machine.
I don't why they ask a deposit for RM200 and it's it's want by cash or credit card. First times in my line someone just ask a deposit for check in.
everything is perfect!!! love it!!!
Would definitely return for my next trip!! Worth every penny, staff were friendly

This hotel have the best location in the heart of Kuala Lumpur. Surrounded with shopping mall and restaurants within walking distance. There is also MRT station in front of the hotel. For local tourist, you can park your car at Lot 10 shopping mall for RM15 (48 hrs) and you may need to verify the parking ticket at hotel lobby before going out.
So far the best hotel now . We love it . The environment is so cozy . Definitely will come back again.
The location of hotel is perfect for walking tourist, near malls and restaurants, room is very clean and comfortable, friendly staff except front counter staff.
Strategic location. Highly recommended. Price ain’t expensive. But they charge RM50 for extra towel
The location was very convenient, walking distance to pavilion, Jalan alor, sungei wang…. The room was clean and big. However the breakfast need to be improved.
very Nice hotel......but only no carpark....park 2day 1night at lot10 charge rm50++
excellent location, comfortable & nice room

reviews.review_title: Choose room with window & without breakfast ”
reviews.review_comment: Everything’s good except for stained blanket and breakfast. They offer in room breakfast now and it’s not worth the price at all.

reviews.review_title: Newly renovated hotel at the center of Bukit Bintang”
reviews.review_comment: New furniture and good amenities, location is excellent, however, no free car park, swimming pool and standard room don't have window. Quite disappointing
overall is good, but the problem is check in and check out..use some time
As we requested for large bed but turns out two single bed… please go thru the comments section.

Overall room design is good and consider clean just…. -send request for earlier check in no reply until I have to ask on the spot only know there is no early check in -all guest only can check in sharp 3pm -slow check in procedure,around 20minute for proceed for each person.all guest waiting in a small lobby area -a hair found in my breakfast tea Environment is nice but Maybe can be better and more improve for check in procedure and services

As the hotel does not have much facilities like gym room or swimming pool, it is suitable for traveller who would like to tour around bukit bintang area. The hotel does not own parking area as well. But they do offer parking validation for those who park at lot 10 with RM15 per entry for one room. Overall, the hotel room design is nice and clean.

reviews.review_title: Best place to stay in KL”
reviews.review_comment: In the heart of Kuala Lumpur, lot’s of shopping malls, convenient stores and restaurants nearby, just beside the MRT and monorail station, and Starbucks in the same building, very convenient. Friendly staff, clean room, comfy bed, large tv, separate bathroom and toilet. Like it very much.
Good
Good location and room is nice But no parking for hotel guest, have to park at Lot10 No one pick up the phone when calling to check whether can check in earlier or not

The hotel is mesmerizing. The interior decor was really pretty. The room was neat, clean and smelled good. It’s in a prime location, lot 10 and pavillion was just few minutes walk. The only downside was the parking tho. Wished it has it own parking lot but given that it was an area in the heart of the city, totally understandable. Would love to stay here again next time :)

reviews.review_title: Most strategic value for money hotel ”
reviews.review_comment: Highly strategic hotel just 5 min walk to pavilion in bukit Bintang. Hotel room nice and clean with nice hotel ambiance. Highly recommend for budget conscious traveler.
Located at the heart of the city, facilities are new with wonderful view of the city. Worth the money.

Everything is good. Maybe due to pandemic,packed breakfast send to room. The breakfast is nice but there is no table in the room for dining. We have to hold and eat on the bed or another option is to open the ironing board as table.
Fantastic location and beautiful, clean, comfortable rooms. Service is excellent.
So near to eateries. Walking distance to malls. Clean room, beautifully upgraded

reviews.review_title: staff write wrong my hotel room number”
reviews.review_comment: counter staff write wrong my hotel room number, after i collect the card and go to the floor, i saw house keeping stil clean my room 1702, i and him both wondering why counter make so big mistake while room havent done yet but already inform client to go stay in, he call to the receiptionest and after 10 mins his supervisor come up and double check, actualy my room number is 1712! others overall ok

The part that i love most abt the stay is the shower as it’s equipped with high pressure energy. It’s very satisfying to experience rain shower style and the soap smells nice. Coffee capsules are provided in the room which is nice and the interior is very urban and well thought out. The only downside is i wish they would inform earlier that we need to provide RM200 via cash or cc as deposit during check in. But all in all, it was a veryyyyy nice stay and i will definitely come back.
The environment is good, but this hotel don’t have parking lot .

1)Parking is troublesome n couldn’t even waive the parking fee.The Wolo customers have to park at Lot 10 and walk all the way to Wolo. Imagine in rainy day. Besides, the customers have to pay a lot for parking fee (if you drive in and out a few times in a day) 2)The sheet has blood stain. 3) my room’s remote control came without batteries, i had to call a few times and waited for a while to get the batteries. 4) the toilet had stench when i first came in to the room. 5) water pressure especially hot water pressure wasnt powerful enough.
Everything good got this Hotel!
Drawback with no parking lot from the hotel
Strategic location New and clean The only problem is no carpark available
Will come back again..
nice location

Mmg mantapp

reviews.review_comment: Toilet side door which can be open from the master bedroom cannot locked, there is washing machine but not functioning. Master bedroom door also cannot completely locked which make it inconvenient for couple to stay
Room inside got 🪳🪳
good place to stay

reviews.review_title: Good place to see the beautiful scenery of city”
reviews.review_comment: Oh i love this hotel, the room, the facilities, city scenery. Surely will repeat again !
it was wonderful place and clean
Nice view and clean
very nice place for family, good accommodation.
But sampah kena buang sendiri 😌

reviews.review_comment: Very nice view, the room was clean and good facilities and good location also.
Nice place to stay with family.

reviews.review_title: The reason I've been here 3 times!”
reviews.review_comment: It's my 3rd time here (Twice under this company's service). Check-in is very easy. The staff will contact you for details. When you arrive, before parking on the parking lot provided, you need to go to the lobby and take the parking card including the room keys. You can park at the waiting area while doing this. After all settled, you can park your car, take your things, the elevator will go straight to your designated room. The room I took was a 2 bedroom premium, means 1 room with King sized bed (with its own bathroom including a large bathtub) and 1 room with a Queen sized bed. The room's facilities are perfect. You have the cookplace with cookwares, super large refrigerator, laundry with a dryer, high speed fiber broadband wifi, a comfortable sofa on the living room, 2 LCD TVs, and also a side long table on the master bed room for you to place your laptop and do your work. Room service is available everyday, 10AM onwards. You can call the staff if you need any assistance. They will try their best to help you! The main attraction here is the infinity Swimming Pool! You can see from here all the 4 most tallest building in Malaysia (KLCC, KL Tower, TRX and Merdeka 118) on a single panoramic view! Finally, it's the location. Located at the heart of city (Jalan Sultan Ismail), it's near to all tourist attractions including top-notch shopping malls. The price? I can promise you, it's insanely worth it!
Professionally managed , spacious, great facility, clean and well maintained. My family had wonderful time staying here. A perfect choice for staycation 💖

reviews.review_title: Great facilities, with room for improvement”
reviews.review_comment: Second visit here. Pros: 1. Loved the facilities. Game room was a highlight and the reason I came again. 2. Strategic location. Close to PJ and Bangsar. 3. Parking was secure, indoor, well lit. RM 5 for 24 hours. 4. Breakfast can be converted to sahur, but had to be notified a day in advance. Cons: 1. Mask wearing was not enforced. Guests in the gameroom weren't wearing masks and even the guard that closed the game room wasn't wearing one. 2. Cleanliness could be improved. Toilet racks were rusted and bedsheets had stains. Rooms that had sofa also had stains on them and that's not a good look. Pull out sofa had crumbs. Elevator buttons were also rusting, but that could be because of reaction with sanitizer. 3. Community kitchen wasn't accessible during sahur. Couldn't use the microwave in the morning at all. Could've made an exception for ramadhan. 4. Can be quite noisy at night as its right beside a highway. All in all, for the price, will probably visit again, but would love for a bit more attention to cleanliness be paid by housekeeping.
