And i need to contact to reception for request , the phone is no have any number listing for me contact. after i go back to hotel , direactly have a staff at my bathroom already. scared me... = = air corn is no cool need to ask people come check and the filter is toooooo dirty. but the technician is coming fast. Price is Value. but services and condition is so so only.
Very comfortable for family trip
everything good , but the lift at the check out time a bit hard to wait need to wait few round.
need to improve in house keeping.

reviews.review_title: Good location but missing some points”
reviews.review_comment: This place is in a good location walking distance to several restaurants places and malls - like KL Gateway, Nexus, and others. Unfortunately, while it's tucked away nicely in Bangsar South, it stands right next to the Federal Hgwy, and if your room is facing the "city view", you can hear the traffic. And for the light sleeper, you will be awaken a few times by cars and motorbike passing by. And not helpful that the bed is not super comfortable. It might need to be turned, but you can feel there's a big dent in the middle.

This is the 2nd time choosing this property for vacation Rooms and environment are good 1st time has free parking but starting this year 2022 there will be no more free parking and the parking rates is ridiculous with RM5 per entry. I wanted to drop by for an hour or 2, and I have to pay repetitively rm5 every entry.. Its really a bad one for this parking.. Won't book it anymore
Nice. But my room not nice view. 😢

Stayed here for 5 nights. Took a Thinker’s Studio 2 room type. There is a little kitchenette with a kettle and 2 mugs. I did expect sachets of coffee or tea bags but it may not have been mentioned when I was booking. Basic hairdryer. Enough space for hanging some clothes and shelves. However, no iron was available and I was too lazy to ask. Also, I brought a medium suitcase but with a larger suitcase, there wouldn’t be much room in the floor to leave it open, esp since we tend to use the suitcases that have items in both sides (hardside luggage). Good sized bed, good linen and pillows and towels were good as well. With a kitchenette I did expect some cutlery and soap for washing said mugs or cutlery. Cleaners do not come to the room unless asked to do I was emptying my takeaway containers on the 1st floor which is a huge space with vending machines as well as another section for washing machines and dryers. Pricey at MYR10 per run for a wash or a dry. Overall, I would stay there again.
Neer kl and Kiara..
Toilet too dirty seem no clean properly, the worst are bedsheet and pillow sheet didn’t change at all, got dirty mark so disgusting! my first and last stay

-Basic stay, no amenities provided except shampoo and body wash. -No free parking, each entry rm5 for 24 hour. -Not as convenient as compare to the hotels around that location. E.g. Food access and convenient stores except at South link.Need to walk around 5 to 10 mins to KL gateway. - the room was clean and bed was comfortable. - free drinking water supply (hot and cold) - strong shower With the price i paid for, unlikely staying again.

Located right in the middle of PJ and KLCC, very close to wherever we want to go. Room is clean and tidy. However there were a few stains on the bed sheet in both rooms. Otherwise is a very great stay! Will definitely come again!

reviews.review_title: All good except cleanliness in room”
reviews.review_comment: location great but quite hard to find. Need to drive slowly and have to keep looking for signboard. Value for money because i book around Nov and stay on Mar. 2 night price = 1 night price if book late. Room Cleanliness is bad. Floor sticky and bathroom have urine smell. Have to keep the toilet floor wet and clean the toilet bowl. Staff friendly. Facilities great.

Dissapointed that they didnt make the room after 1 day staying, need to call them so. Even have put door sign to makeup room. Also, parking have to pay per entry. Thou the location is good, we need to get out frequently, disappointing need to pay parking at the hotel we actually paid to stayed in. Food for sahur also served late.
The room makes use of space efficiently.
Suitable for family couple n single person...couzy n very clean....very recommended...
Love the bed it's very comfortable, the public area has vending machines, laundry room, kitchen etc. Value for money!
Love the facilities however check out time at 11am is too early vs check in time 3pm. ☹️

The room was not very clean and the toilet was also unclean. less ventilation in the room. I didn't get the fresh air and feels trapped. Please keep the rooms clean as I could see the stains and dirts everywhere especially the toilet.
Safe
like this is cheaper
Why charge parking fee should be free for hotel guests
good

Facilities is given mostly outside of ur unit like water dispense but during our stay the water dispense is nt functioning. Our room didnt give microwave as stated in description and no soap or any shampoo, so remember to bring ur own toiletries. The room is clean and comfortable to stay. The vehicle circulation and basement carpark are very bad, too much bummer on floor, it could be up to 6 bummer for short distance, very uncomfortable to drive. Circulation way to enter lift lobby from carpark also very weird, u need to walk up and down staircase due to different levelling. And also carpark fee is rm5 PER ENTRY, it's nt vehicle friendly for this kind of carpark layout, so i wont recommend it to my friend.

They need to add at least 2 mineral water, 2 pack of coffee or tea! Also must provide toothbrush. They didn’t put anything all all !!! Not even a hand soap. You must wash your hand by shampoo! Parking also have to pay! No free parking for the hotel quest.

reviews.review_title: value of money , good location and good room with good facilities.”
reviews.review_comment: overall the hotel is good, just that the front desk staff is not so helpful. I have requested for extra pillow and blanket as we have baby here so we need to block the bed to prevent baby fall down, but sadly the staff told us that there is no more extra blanket and pillows. Overall is a good stay here.

This is my second trip to komune living The room is not so clean compared to my 1st trip Dusty, with lots of missing things such as no condiments/ no spoon and all The parking previously was free, but now need to pay rm5. The parking machine however is so faulty that it didnt return your balance I was already frustrated because during check up, the system was error at the self check up machine but the staff blame me saying i didnt follow the machine instructions while the problem lies at the machine who unable to accept the room key. When using the second machine, proven their system is in error and instead the staff didnot even apologize when he previously blame me due to error. When paying parking also machine didnt return balance, piss-off by the stacking issues, i just left. The pool as usual is fantastic but if maintenance issues not improved, i dont think i want to come back for another stay.

One key thing about small space is functionality. Yes I was given the upgrade from Dreamer (light colored walls 1 bed) to Thinker Two( 2 beds). I understand that they just want to provide 1 TV in in the small living area between the 2 bedrooms but even the sliding doors open the opposite side, not adjacent to the TV. I can't imagine sharing the rooms with friends where only 1 person can sit and watch TV. When my friends come to KL to visit me, I would prefer somewhere to just chill. This place is not it even if the location is fantastic
Perfect for those who need some time away from home, and to get work sorted. 10/10 will come back.

Make sure to make the room 100% clean before customers check-in. Also, there’s a lot of customer who need to make an early check-in, so don’t expect they need to follow the hotel check-in time as they may have an emergency that make them to make an early check-in.
Love all bout the dreamy room type - wish the check out time could be at 12 instead of 11

Really love the location of this place. Love the mini design, bed is also very comfortable, a/c is working very well it's very cold at night, the place is very very clean. And there is a water dispenser near the lift, that's our favourite part of the stay. Just little things that could improve, the hot shower is pretty unstable, turns cold and hot. body wash dispenser is empty. my towel has a huge hole. very few power plugs in the living room area. full body mirror is pretty dirty. but those are just minor issues. overall, we really enjoyed our stay there! will come back to stay again :))

This hotel has lost its charm. Use to be a value for money hotel but now the service provided is not up to par. You can find a better hotel for the same price easily elsewhere. RM 5 for parking everytime you go out is just ridiculous.
a good place to stay with good services and facility.
Great hotel and value for money

More transparency on parking facility, hotel residents to be exempted from parking free. RM 5 per entry charges are way higher if we make multiple entry to premises. Considering multiple entry charges, one could opt for getting hotel with free parking as the overall charges might be still within the expected budget
Everything good!

reviews.review_title: All good except the cleanliness & noises”
reviews.review_comment: Loveee all the facilities provided such as the games room, pool, gym, and a space to cook. When I read most of the review was encountered with the elevator problem but during my time all is good, no delays, I guess they already fix it. The only problem is, I’ve mentioned that I need a quiet room since I have trouble sleeping, but they assigned me to a room next to the main road, the windows in the room are not soundproof at all, even the walls, I can literally listen to every little thing. And the toilet is not clean enough. There's mold along with the shower. I hope the management can improve the cleanliness.
late check in and no parking available but security guards are very helpful to assist. room are awesome with affordable price

small room. stains on towel. tv mirror for ios cant be used. no complimentary nescafe/tea or even water bottle in room. extremely poor soundproofing. i can hear every footsteps of person upstairs. and person outside. parking rm5 per entry. bed was ok. toilet shower was clogged. location wise was ok. however would not recommend.

Only stay if you like the coliving concept.Check in also need to be done at kiosk even if the reception have staff available. All the hotel amenities need to be purchased.so ensure to bring your own when plan to stay for few nights.

Actually I’m booking the hotel just for relaxing but the room so empty no coffee sachet, no mineral water, no toiletries, no rubbish basket and the swimming pool also small & crowded..It’s my first and last stayed at the hotel.

reviews.review_title: No toothbrush, toothpaste, cutlery, free parking ”
reviews.review_comment: - Shower area clogged and water trapped after 5 minutes. - Dusty and many bedsheet got hair. - Queued 30 min for self checkin machine but unable to check in. At the end go back to counter to check in. - No cutlery like spoon and fork provided. Disaster as we forgot to take after order Grab food and takeaway food from outside. Spoken to customer service but they said hotel no provide cutlery and komune cafe only open for breakfast hour - Pool is nice but crowded with kids - Level 1 game zone is not 24 hours, open until 10pm - Room door unable to close properly. It will beep until you go to close properly by yourself - Room TV is LG Smart TV but only support Android screen mirror. Cant even watch YouTube on a Smart TV. - Parking used to be free, now RM5
Biasa biasa
If want to stay at fancy place it so recommended to stay in here,
Check in with no towels inside the room. Walkway 7th flrs - Dirty Room Housekeeping - Need to request

reviews.review_title: Nice Place to Crash for a Night or Two”
reviews.review_comment: Pros: affordable price, breakfast available, co-working space available, not so cramped for a room with single bed, free flow drinking water in the corridor, infinity pool with nice view Cons: Very slow internet in the room (5 Mbps), no bath amenities except towel, narrow working table in the room, smelly bathroom drains, no coffee or tea sachets (only water heater, jugs, and mugs).

reviews.review_title: A clean & cosy hotel - value for money!”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel’s location is good. The room is clean & cosy. I stayed for 2 nights and I’m quite happy with the stay. Didn’t have time to use the facilities. Had some trouble with the internet connection on the first night but it was ok on the second. Will definitely stay here again.
Good Location and worth the price

Not really prefer this if you are looking for a spacious room. Room for 4 persons is very small. And, no towel provided, we have to request. But luckily the speed of service is ok. The parking rate is reasonable, only RM5 per entry. Overall I give 6.5 out of 10.

reviews.review_title: In room facilities wasn’t align what listed in room descriptions”
reviews.review_comment: Down side: 1. Toiletries is not provided in room which we need to buy from property 2. Cleanliness is not good, stained is visible all around the room 3. Requested for late check out during booking, but they didn’t take note of that. Called to reception they only checked and informed us only allow for 30 minutes else will be extra charges. 4. TV couldn’t support any devices mirroring Good side: 1. Mattress and pillows is comfy 2. Receptions is polite
recommended

Have been staying here for most of my trips to KL. The place is near facilities and easy to access. Food court is nearby. Clean and tidy. The only setback is that the pillows are high and not soft which made sleeping uncomfotable. Wish the management can look into this. The rest are all very satisfactory.👍
Everything was so perfect
Friendly staff! Clean and spacious room! Nice decorations lobby with spacious waiting area! Recommended
Need to pay parking everytime come in.
First time staying this room type. Nice and comfy. Recommended staying here. The parking rate a bit expensive.
Repeated stay. First time trying this room type. The toilet is unclean and no towels spotted
Very clean and customers friendly. There is self check-in/check-out kiosk.. parking before was free but now it's charged u RM5 per entry.. overall so nice n comfortable

Few problems encountered for an one-night stay: 1) Key card wasn’t able to power up the main switch. 2) Key card wasn’t able to access our room due to door locked out of battery. 3) Bad soundproof 4) Elevator super slow during check out time. However, staffs were very helpful and managed to solve the first 2 issues quickly.
Sheets with blood and coffee stains, no one will come change for you even if you asked many times. Floor sticky and room full of small flies. This place is a nightmare.
Good room
No free parking. And call room service also No coming for help . actually I stay this hotel 4 time but this time very disappointed
Nice view

The rooms are very small but clean. The pool was not clean (other travelers were not hygienic) and the lift system causes a massive waste of time so if you travel with family you will be late for everything because you have to wait up to 30 minutes for an available lift. The games room is nice -all games are free , there's a little library too. Staff are polite. Worst part - unclean pool thanks to other travelers being gross, terrible waste of time because of lifts.
Nnnnnn
Make sure Near facilities

Room is small and I saw some people smoke in front of my room. Not sure if the room is smoking room, but I don't think the door is soundproof (or maybe because the room is too small) so I can hear the voice outside of the door. However it's worth the price.

hotels.name: The RuMa Hotel and Residences
hotels.address: 7 Jalan Kia Peng,, KLCC, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 50450

reviews.review_comment: Loved the ambience and kid loved the spacious room and bathtub as well. Just a 5-10min stroll to klcc park. Will be back again.

Very nice and lovely place. Booked there to wind down. Enjoyed the spa. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Especially the waitre who serve us breakfast. Breakfast! The nicest breakfast i ever had in any hotel! As it serve eggs benedict with salmon/brisket! And you can order as how much you want! Also love their coffee. Overall, 15/10 will come again and recommended. ❤️
I must say the design is stunning and thoughtful, eg. the location of the shampoo tray. The interior design is of tastefully crafted contemporary Malay art.
staff were friendly and value for money.
Everything is perfect! Thank you to all staff especially Mr Jamil.

I had a brilliant getaway of doing nothing but luxuriating in the beautiful room, all curled up in the comfortable bed. The room service was excellent as was the spa. It was too short a stay to do more than catch up on sleep but oh what a wonderful place to do it!

Hotel staff is very very friendly. Went in Christmas, I received a Christmas gift bags as well. Due to Christmas peak season, it got full house. But full house doesn’t stop them from doing their best. Was very hungry after our party in the midnight, and surprisingly the kitchen is still available, their char kuey teow was good ! Very Wok-Hei !! Book a normal room. Flexibility on late check out. The room is very very spacious. Suitable for small family as well.

I was surprised at how intimate this hotel feels , esp when surrounded by big, chain hotels around the klcc area. Check in and check out was easy. The room layout was very nice and i think it has the best bathtub ( i have been in many bath tubs lol ). They leave the name of the staff who did your room housekeeping which was a nice touch. The lighting panel was confusing but i think its because my age was showing. I would come again.

Was really impressed with the check in service, it was quick and efficient. All the staff were really friendly as well, from the concierge to room service. I particularly liked the interiors of the hotel, very woody and gave a calm vibe. The room was spacious too and everything in the fridge was free. The only thing was that I hoped the bath tub was a little bigger and the pool as well. But other than that, very pleasant stay with RuMa.
recommended! room clean and friendly service!
Loved it. Been here few times and every single time it's just hits the right spot. Ruma really gives you the home away from home experience.
Overall is awesome!
Feel like home. Will repeat again

reviews.review_title: One of The Best Places Ever”
reviews.review_comment: Everything was perfect about this place. Rooms: Extremely clean and comfortable rooms with a quaint yet updated traditional look and feel. I very much enjoyed the bath tub available in the rooms - soaked all my stress away. Facilities: Pretty limited to just a gym, swimming pool and a spa. F&B: Breakfast delivered to the room - quite pricey but the quality of food and beverages were excellent. Service: Hotel staff service was on point - one such example of the excellent service was when I was at the pool swimming and forgot to bring a towel with me. Without even requesting and much to my surprise, two bath towels were brought to my lounge chair. Cons: My one small disappointment I experienced was regarding the flexible check-out time (which was not accommodated) everyone I knew talked about. Would've been great if I could enjoy the facilities a little bit longer. Overall, great accommodation. Will come back if the prices were more reasonable.
good

reviews.review_title: Good location, value for money, nice breakfast food”
reviews.review_comment: RuMa Hotel is one of the pricier establishments out there, but you get what you pay for (not sure if you feel the same paying full price without Agoda or direct website promos) with an excellent breakfast (they adhere to SOPs), complementary minibar and water, Nespresso machine and spacious room. It is also located in-between KLCC and Pavilion - not near enough where you can wear 5-inch heels to walk or while carrying 2 suitcases, but near enough to not get drenched in sweat (the walk is sort of uphill). My only suggestions for improvement are to have a mix of thick and thin pillows as I find the overly thin pillows uncomfortable, and the lack of tissues (housekeeping missed this out because the tissue box is inside the drawer and they didn't realise it's finishing - understandable as I don't expect them to stick their hands inside seeing as COVID is still rampant, but perhaps have 2 tissue boxes? One for the living room and one for the bathroom?). Other than these I'm pleased with my stay and would recommend others to stay here again - I would come again myself but I would need to save up for it / wait for a special occasion).
One of the best 5 stars hotel in town. Very attentive staff and we enjoyed our stay so much

reviews.review_title: The room is clean and comfortable”
reviews.review_comment: The room is clean and comfortable. The staff is very friendly

Glad to say after 2 years away The RuMa still has that special feel and charm. Gracious and friendly staff. Special mention to Kak Rozita for her warm welcome!! Well thought out design giving it that tranquil ambience. If only they brought back 24 hour check in and check out it will make even more perfect....😁
Everything was perfect! Will visit again
nice service , nice room

It was a birthday staycation for my fiancé and I. Hotel free upgraded us to grand king room, decorated with balloons & prepared a birthday dessert for my fiancé. Staffs are very welcoming, everything was worth the price.
very noise can hear next room sound and outside corridor walk way people walk around and door close sound .

reviews.review_title: Everything was good except the view”
reviews.review_comment: Good experience except the breakfast is mediocre.
late checkout give up 2pm for me to pray zuhur breakfast at Atas Nice n so lovely room inside give junkfood
I like the design of the hotel room very much, it is very comfortable and feels like home, I can stay in the room all day and don't want to go out hahaha
Positive comments from check-in until check out, no que for check-in, the staff come to you for check-in, no stress. Room is very cosy and comfortable, value for money! Facilities are also best!
Good service and clean！
Location, decoration, everything about hotel is termendous
only issue is the price, but we got it during promo at half price so problem solved!
I would like to say The RuMa Hotel is one of the best hotel. The hospitality presented for us was really good. Everything runs smoothly for me and my husband. Would definitely come here again.
great
Nice room with great breakfast!
The "senior looking staff" mustn't take off his mask especially talking and mixing drinks without a mask.
top notch service by the staff.really helpful on guiding us to stroll around KL.room deco really beautiful. But the breakfast menu was limited and tasteless
1st time stay here and for sure I will be back again soon. Well-done The Ruma. Keep it up the service quality.
except AC is warm
Great attention to detail on interior and service

I had the best view of the whole KLCC scape! Staff were extremely frendly and welcoming despite the New year's eve crowd. Room is extremely clean, a very good location for a staycation, everything touristy can be walking distance
Love the hostmanship concept. Staffs were friendly and they call you by name, surely different from other hotels i've been to. .
One of the best hotels I’ve stayed so far, staffs are friendly, room is super clean, we enjoy our stay very much. Will come back again!
Totally recommended. Modern contemporary concepts really cool.
Helpful staff, very clean and modern design, strategic location.

The interior design is very nice. Room is very comfortable too. Walking distance to Pavilion. The staff are very polite and friendly too. Only complain I have is the check in process took about 30 minutes and I had to pass my credit card + IC to them without supervision. At one point i saw my card and IC was left on the counter without anyone looking after it. Regardless, we had an enjoyable stay.
From check-in to late checkout, overall 100% smoother, and I never forget for breakfast- they serve the best cheese in the world 🌎 - you should try guys
Good ID & room condition. Hotel environment also interesting

reviews.review_title: Great couple staycation. Right at the city center”
reviews.review_comment: Fantastic room and services. Food was alright but if your are ordering room service, I recommend the coconut dessert.
Very comfort and clean

reviews.review_title: Probably the best hotel in Kuala Lumpur”
reviews.review_comment: Everything was fantastic, from the concierge to the room and it’s wonderful facilities. The hotel and its rooms has a Balinese feel to it. Everything was great. However, tried to reach the concierge and the room service via the in house phone but it was not reachable until I called using my own private phone. Got to improve on that, otherwise, flawless stay
We enjoyed our stay! The place with privacy
Thank you Kiki for your hospitality. Thank you to reservation team for arranging the decoration and cake in my room. For ATAS eatery staff for your service during my birthday dinner.
Indeed it’s home away from home with a contemporary living in mind, great room amenities and friendly staff. This is my go-to staycation hotel in KL. 😊
the hotel is more suitable for business trips instead for families with younger children. there is a sky bridge to KLCC & Pavilion., just a 5 to 10 mins walk.
Lots of complimentary given by the hotel. Very comfy bed and all around good

Had a night stay with my hub & kids. The hotel is very beautiful with Christmas settings, nice bed and bathtub. We had wonderful breakfast at ATAS restaurant. All the staff in hotel is polite and pool staff is helpful to show me the lift button to the restaurant. Everything is perfect, the only thing is the room bidet is leaking water and I forgotten to inform the hotel staff. Mayb they can check into it. Thanks for the hospitality, keep it up!
Breakfast have to be improved
Loving the vibes, breakfast and the room is sparkling clean!
Great location, walking distance to Pavillion and KLCC. Room is nice and comfortable especially the mattress. Breakfast choice not much but taste good.
Totally pleased with the exceptional room, service and experience. Will definitely visit again soon!
Stayed here for one night with my wife and kids. Overall very satisfying

Came here for my birthday staycation in October 2021 and the staff so kind to decorate the room with balloons and complimentary cake. Totally enjoyed our stay in The Ruma KL. The room so high tech and the blinds come down automatically as we enter. Love the interior design of this hotel and the staffs outfit are amazing! Excellent hotel with great customer services.
Superb hotel location. Friendly staffs The check in process was fast. clean hotel room with city view.
Definitely recommended, such a warming 5star hotel.
Deserved five star and I experienced it. I wanna repeat here. Hope they always give the best service
Thank you so much for the amazing hospitality and the quality of service and facilities! Fully recommended if you want to experience a hotel that is just amazing overall!
Attentive staff, room cleanliness is good , location perfect , May be facilities wise not enough! Highly recommended to those business travelers need to stay In CBD KL .

I would like to express my gratitude to all the Ruma’s staff. They are so friendly and helpful. One of the staff help us to get the babycot and prayer mat without waiting for us to request for it. Everything was perfect!

Too crowded during weekends. Pool is full in the morning and afternoon. Breakfast can get congested, but the food is fine. Room is good, amenities are fine, complementary mini bar is very appreciated. If you're looking for peace and quiet and serenity in the city, this is not it.
Definitely worth it kinda place! But not a fan of crowded pool area as they had event at the pool area.

My husband and I had our mini honeymoon here, and everything about the stay was lovely! Their rooms have bathtubs for a good soak, and basically everything you'd need for a comfortable stay. Breakfast was nice, and you can request for breakfast-in-bed too. Walking distance to Pavilion, and parking is FOC with validation.

Had the opportunity to stay a night at their Deluxe King room. Loved the decor of the whole place, very traditional rustic like. Loved that the bathtub faces the window with a view altho can't appreciate much at night. Only thing is the food, nt very impressed with their breakfast spread altho their eggs Benedict are good. The rest are just so-so and unfortunately there's room for improvement for their waitress (needed to prompt a few times to get things done). Overall, good stay. Would I come back again? Definitely.

The room is spacious, bed, pillow are comfy, toiletries are perfect. Another added point is able to mirror my iPhone to the TV, we can watch drama, video thru the tv. A little tips on the toiletries, if you couldn’t find it, they are located at the left drawer, when you pull it out, you might not see it, because it might stuck inside. We spent sometimes to find it.
Worth every penny. Walking distance to Pavillion & KLCC. Room is unique, clean and look new.

reviews.review_title: One of the best hotel ever stayed”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel’s location is walking distance to most of the major city attractions like KLCC, Pavilion Mall, Starhill and Jalan P.Ramlee. Hotel have parking and free when you validate at the lobby. Our breakfast was served in the room during weekdays. The pool is amazing overlooking the city. Can also smoke cigar at pool bar. We didn’t try the restaurants but I’m sure it’s excellent because we saw lots of occupied tables. The room is the one where it will make you not want to leave this place. Complete with full amenities, robes, slippers, Nespresso machine, etc. The beverages in the minibar were provided for guests staying more then 2 nights. The bed and pillows are comfortable but a bit soft for my wife and I. The whole design and aesthetic of the place is very well thought off. The service given by the hotel staffs in The RuMa is impeccable especially the housekeeping and room service people.

I booked the hotel one day before checkin. In the morning call the hotel if they can setup like a decoration for my anniversary and they said can. I also booked spa slot for my wife. Arrived around 5pm and need to wait a bit. Frontdesk staffs quite busy and a little in stress mood i think. Not really friendly. Is oky. Later when up to my room and i saw no decoration like i asked them to do. Go check at frontdesk and they said no note or remark under myname. Nevermind. Then i ordered room service, popcorn chicken and club sandwich. Popcorn chicken taste like yucky.But club sandwich nice. Breakfast ordered chicken soup wantan and also chicken taste yucky. Then i think overall, not value for money. Just my two cents. But my wife enjoy the spa a lot.

Would like to thank the staff who is so thoughtful to the guest. Room was so clean and bed is too comfortable for me to even want to leave! Breakfast in room is on point too and so worth the money and stay.
Nice staycation for my family! walking distance to KLCC & Pavillion. Friendly staff!
This hotel super cosy, efficient staff & all the food was good

Overall a good decent hotel, staff was very good . Breakfast in my opinion could have been a lot better with more variety. We couldn’t use the swimming people , because it was crowded , I suggest to have an alternative pool (maybe charge an amount , so that it would be more private ) . Overall I give this a 4/5 star .
Staff friendly ! Is a good vacation

even during mco. the staycation and facilities were in the great condition. the beauty of the lobby and the grand staircase, with the complimentary mini bar inside my room, all 5 star. you can even request for early check in and very late check out. i love this hotel so much. definitely will come again!
nice for stay

What a luxury stay and relax time after a controlled becoz of covid19.... Well, only one thing do wish upgrade on it. The breakfast time, their staff would busy get order from each table and miss send those food by ordering. And KItchen unable to get fast in order to.match the customer order. Not a good way for practise morning schedule. By the way, the food was really nice. I love it just wait a long time and did not get my wonton soup

I really like the ambience of the lobby, the rooms. It gives a different feeling with the interior. The room also gives the cozy upper class local house feeling with the wood interior. All the lighting, the toilet, the doors, the fan. Not like other hotel. The staff also very helpful in explaining.
Very nice design and atas hotel although slightly pricey. The swimming pool is quite crowded and no time slot reservation is required.
best hotel ever
Happy to stay in hotel, nice environment! Defiantly will come back again
Just want to say, overall fantastic..and you all need to try this hotel!!!!🤩🤩🤩✨✨✨

So far , the only hotel that has flexi check in and check out, free mini bar. Excellent service. Good and nice staff. Mr khairul, if i'm not mistaken, he is very good and very helpful person. Want to repeat again!!!😁
I had an amazing experience here! Everything was great!

Very peaceful, relax & comfort eventhough the hotel in the middle of the city. The Hotel management was followed the SOP very strictly while still maintaining the friendly welcoming attitude to its customer very well. Just to query for the room dine-in menu, the portion of the food was not much as I was expected for this luxury hotel. Other than that, all perfect.

reviews.review_title: One of the best hotel in Kuala Lumpur”
reviews.review_comment: The staff and their service is nice, the room is nice and clean, and the breakfast is not too bad also, overall 10/10.

reviews.review_title: Average Joe Hotel with a ridiculous price!”
reviews.review_comment: The room is quite spacious and nicely decorated. It comes with a few cans of carbonated drinks as compliments. Here we go into details on the downside list of the hotel: bed was not up to my preference.. unlike most of 5 stars hotel in KL, where the quality of the bed is simply the best! Here at Ruma ? Not even a word could i describe how awful the bed is! One of the hotel staff at the breakfast section should be fired asap!. Bias against local or average looking family. No need for me to explain further. Overall, an unpleasant stay and not worthy for the amount of money that ive paid.
Staff were friendly and amenities were great. Comfortable weekend getaway.
The hotel totally beyond my expectation and definitely will stay again. Room service is perfect.

The property is within walking distance of KLCC. The lobby is posh and gives a sense of exclusivity. The layout of the room is very creative. The highlight is the bed - comfort level beyond imagination. Bath and shower with strong water pressure.

Had my 10th anniversary staycation here and got free upgrade in room. Love the design and cleanliness of the hotel. Upon checking in, they already know my name and served me with drinks and detailed explanation. The breakfast included were superb. The service is excellent! Love the flexible check in and out time and the minibar! Location wise is just 8 mins walk to pavilion and 5 mins walk to klcc park. In conclusion, everything is perfect!

I chose to stay at RuMa during MCO since business sector is open for public. Since our staycation is during MCO, no facilities at RuMa is open for guest. But there's in-room dining where you can choose from 1 out of 3 breakfast set from vege to Malaysian meal set. I've got 2 set of free breakfast since i chose for Free Breakfast package in Agoda. For me eventhough no facilities is open, the location of RuMa itself is good where you can walk to nearest mall (either to Pavillion or KLCC). Bonus point for RuMa is you can have flexi check-in and check out. You have to confirm with the reservation office at least 24 hour before your arrival date if you want to come as early at 1am or to check-out as late as 11pm. Definitely we will come back to RuMa after MCO is over, for us to try facilities offered such as gym, swimming pool and spa :)

reviews.review_title: Superb Hotel, Superb Services, Top Notch HOtel”
reviews.review_comment: Top Notch Hotel & Service. Excellent Amenities. Great experience right from check-in to check-out. No complains!! Keep up the excellent job The RUMA folks!! Will definitely return & absolutely recommended to everyone.
The service attitude is good, the environment and equipment are great too, I would like to come again.

hotels.name: InterContinental Kuala Lumpur
hotels.address: 165, Jalan Ampang, KLCC, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 50450

reviews.review_title: Great hotel, Excellent service, Strategic location”
reviews.review_comment: Warm welcome by staff when arriving, smooth check in, all staff I met were friendly and helpful. Stayed two nights breakfast were nice with great varieties. 10mins walk to Suria KLCC, there's a bus stop in front of hotel to get around too if dont want to drive. Will definitely stay again when visiting KL

Warm welcome by The staffs. Strategic place Good breakfast variety I had come urgent calls that hold up my check out, front desk allowed my check out to extend for another hour Over all, we had a very pleasant stay at The hotel. Would dedinately consider revisiting
Overall 5 star
I like the room a lot. Spacious and comfortable. Convenient location to mall nearby. Although has a bit hiccups on the 1 day, the staff has promptly responded and apologize asap.

reviews.review_title: even though there was nothing much for children”
reviews.review_comment: they enjoy the poolside fun and services are so good in the restaurants especially the breakfast cafe, staffs are so well trained and polite and so helpful.
The service is great and the staffs are very friendly, helpful and observant. However, the taste of the food (breakfast buffet) and the variety requires some attention and improvement.
Staff services well done Room very clean
Hotel room is good, although the hotel is not a new hotel. However, the hospitality is good and staff is very attentive and helpful.
Value for money. Breakfast was superb. So much variety
Great hotel but we think breakfast quality and variety need to improve. Anyway value for money
dw

Mr Yong from the reception welcome me with an open heart. Offered me a complimentary extra bed. I already fell in love with the generous gesture from him. With definitely repeat my staycation at this hotel. Intercontinental Hotel KL is the best among the best.
If u are looking for variety of foods, you can try this hotel. The taste was good too.
All the staffs very polite and kind although if you have many questions, which shows they are well trained. Room is clean and spacious.
The luggage placement area is full of dust, bed sheets have a little stains other than that the hotel is fine, very near to KLCC
Tqsm Intercontinental for surprising me with a complementary bday cake! Great service! 👍🏻
Stayed for 3D2N , definitely wonderful stay ! The Club benefits and the Hotel Staffs are Wonderful !
Food is good, clean rooms, baby friendly pool
Recommended hotel with low budget for whoever wish to stay in the centre of the KL!
very friendly staffs..that made the experience much better
Easy to excess car park. Staff very helpful and friend, warm welcome to the customer. Will come again next time.
Its a walking distance to klcc. Staff are very welcoming and helpful. Breakfast buffet is okay. The room is very clean and very spacious.
We get sneeze and flu each time on the air-cond in the room.
Nice room, cozy & clean..!
very comfortable for my family with 1 kids, breakfast also have many variety of foods, will repeated again
Overall ok, only the hotel a bit old
Good hotel

reviews.review_title: Among the best hotel in KL”
reviews.review_comment: Good food, good accomodation, friendly staff.
Good
It's very good location, free parking. All staffs are very nice The room are good and very beautiful toilet. Love it.
Breakfast is nice and delicious
We enjoyed our 1 night stay. Their family deluxe room was big and clean. Breakfast spread was good too. Will definitely go back for my staycation.
5 star hotel! the room very spacious, breakfast was good and many choices of food! staff very helpfull. so far i like this hotel! will come back to stay here!

Great service rendered by front office team. Thank you Mr Adam for your assistance. You have been a great front office personnel. Thumbs up. This guy deserve a raise.. Room is big, breakfast is good, housekeeping is good. Overall all worth the stay and definitely will be back.
VERY NICE F&B TEAM, I LIKE THE FOOD
Perfect location, room spacious, friendly staff, nice ambience

Im more than happy to stay here for two days last time. The staff is so friendly. The assistant is so much appreciated. The place also is strategical. Near to many interesting places. Would recommend it to everyone! Lotsa loves.
Love the breakfast… So many choices

Decided to check in here because wanna bring my husband celebrate his birthday at Troika (walking distance). Plus the review of buffet was so good and yes they did it nice for the breakfast buffet! Staff friendly. No issue staying here. Keep it up!
This is my first time coming to this hotel. The room was big, comfort n soft bed and pillow..The breakfast here also was awesome because there are many variety foods you can eat.
i like the food , ausome
Worth for short escape
love all in kl

reviews.review_title: Proper Hotel with Everything I Need”
reviews.review_comment: - Good breakfast - All facilities and amenities - Everything you need in a good hotel and more!

reviews.review_title: Perfect hotel for family with kids”
reviews.review_comment: I had a wonderful experience. Every staff member were delightful and eager to help. The room is clean, very comfortable and the staff was amazing. I will come again. Kids also love this place.
Love the breakfast! Nice hotel for staycation 👍🏽

reviews.review_title: Good location and excellent breakfast spread”
reviews.review_comment: I was so impressed with the breakfast spread. So much of food variety and the service is so good. I celebrated my birthday and wedding anniversary in the hotel. They provided a cake and decor the room with complimentary. Will definitely stay in this hotel again.
The breakfast is great, so many varieties. The hotel overall is clean and the staff is helpful
A nice place for staycation as it give a lot of comfort during our stay.
This is the most preferable for me to stay with the love one!
Superb! Lavvvit
A very nice stay here. Very friendly staff. Breakfast buffet also definitely awesome !!

I've stayed at numerous five-star hotels but not all of of them provide the highest standards expected. For the amount I paid, it is one of the best value-for-money stays I've ever had. The staff were friendly, helpful, and efficient, the rooms were nice and clean with all the amenties you would expect, the pool was well-landscaped and lovely, and my favourite part - the breakfast buffet. The food quality and variety was one of the best I've had at a hotel and how many salad bars come equipped with a lovely wooden bowl and spatulas for you to mix your salad in? Thank you, Intercontinental KL for a wonderful experience.

Very acessible location to many places within city center. Staff is friendly and helpful. Checking in and out is hassle free and quick. Wifi is free and good if you are on business trips. Free parking for hotel guest, but the pathway down to the parking is slightly narrow, need to be extremely careful if you have bigger or longer vehicle.
The variety food of bfast is the best t service.
this is not 5 star hotel
Good hotel with good location

reviews.review_title: A promise for family guests became a, nightmare”
reviews.review_comment: we booked 2 rooms for 6 pax of 5 adults & 1 children, the hotel proposed 2 deluxe room for each room is for 3 guests to sleep but by the time we arrived & check into the room, we were shocked to find out in fact the rooms are only suitable for 2 guests each. And if we are not happy we can order extra beds at RM120++ each. That's ridiculous & as good as cheating. They should have just offer us room with proper beds for 3 guests. We decided not to bulge into such extortion practise.. Thank you but no thanks anymore. You deserve the best cover up promotion award!

Very good experience in the hotel , their breakfast is away worth than the price , wide choices and delicious ! Besides , the hotel is very clean and good location . Highly recommend to whoever planning to find comfortable hotel in good price . The staff is very friendly and helpful.
Everything was superb & excellent! Room was amazing & clean. Food taste great & high quality. Worth your money! 10/10. The best hotel I’ve stayed in KL so far. Service & staff top notch & friendly.

Great place to stay for staycation especially if you doubtful about travel oversea. Shahrul F&B still giving us outstanding hospitality during breakfast and Bell Sir is so professional. Unpleasant experience for this stay was we paying extra for additional breakfast for kid… and yet people in front us is not paying anything! Overall ok!
very nice service from the staff, encountered door lock problem when first check in, the manager upgraded my room to a premium room version.
Spacious room! Clean and beautiful! Comfy bed and pillows! Breakfirst was so so good! Staff are very helpful and friendly! 😍😍
The staffs is soo friendly and spacious room.. only the dinner buffet is so-so.. average.

I stay at this hotel for workation. The breakfast was great. The location is strategic 2 minutes walk from ampang park station. Superb breakfast, awesome staff and very calm environment. The room is value for money. Definitely will choose this hotel next time. Major love!
Nice stay. Nice staff. Perfect lounge access with great food & drinks.

Booked through Agoda with the best deal. Warm welcome & hospitality by Mr.Adam & upgraded to another room. Spacious, comfortable bed & clean bathroom. KLCC is nearby, just a walking distance. There's a delicious Japanese restaurant next to hotel. Such convenient especially when you are too lazy to go further. Overall, great for us! Keep it up!
Clean and comfortable room. Friendly staffs...will visit again 😍

Should upgrade the facilities for room to accomodate with current situation. The hotel name was great but not the room. Especiallythe bathroom, old design. Food ok la..standard and common. Nothing wow factor. However variety of standard choices
Clean and nice facilities.nice breakfast as well
The best one so far.
Staff were very attentive to our needs (late check-in and late check-out) Room is clean and comfy

Air conditioning is not functioning, very warm room. Have contact helpdesk several times to request change room however no reply from them. During checkout, charge us 2 rooms as new room was opened for us without informed. Was really disappointed with the service, doesn't worth the money

The room design feels old. But clean. Staying there for 2 nights with a 2yo child. Everything is fine. Staffs are friendly. The buffet breakfast with variety of choice. The swimming pool is small and crowded. While I swim there for 30mins, the coconut tree branches fall down TWICE! Luckily no one underneath. The bar at the pool side undergo renovation.
We really enjoyed the club lounge! Staffs there were really friendly and helpful.
Awesome hospitality! Big room and very comfortable.

Hotel abit old. Summary of other reviews Location 5/5 Bed 5/5(comfy) Breakfast buffet 3.5/5 (lack of choices compared to other hotel) Room 3.5/5(carpet below tv is wet from the time i check in till next day i check out) Toilet 5/5 Check in and out time 5/5

reviews.review_title: A very good place for staycation”
reviews.review_comment: The bathtub is the best thing in this trip. And the service of the hotel is good, but I did met some problem when I am trying to order for in room dining service. Other than that, the reception told me there are vegetarian options provided in the restaurant but when I arrived only realize there are fried rice and fried noodle only. Overall, this trip is still satisfied.
New Year eve staycation, love everything about this hotel..great stay

It's a 5 star hotel! What more can you ask. The room was beautiful, spacious and comfortable. The toilet was clean and shiny. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Overall a very nice stay and experience!
value for money
We choose king deluxe room and we glad that the room size was so big since our daughter like to play around. The staff was so helpful and the swimming pool was suitable for children
Worth the money! Spacious room! Friendly staff!
good as it is. might repeat this hotel. very near to klcc and staff are very good and friendly

reviews.review_title: Great hotel for a relaxing trip”
reviews.review_comment: I couldn't find the last review I wrote on the Agoda app so I won't write another one here. The hotel is good and you can read my full review on Google.

I enjoyed my 3D2N stays in Intercontinental Kuala Lumpur. Friendly and helpful staffs; variety of food choices in the breakfast buffet; cozy and lovely room; I would definitely come again in the future.
Smooth check in and out. The room so spacious. Best bed. Near to KLCC n Avenue K (10mins walk) Friendly staff.
The best hotel
Located near all the malls and attraction center . Lovely rooms and staff and a good breakfast spread. We had a good time. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED and worth the price paid. Tq
The breakfast buffet is good, many choices of western and Asian food. The room is spacious and clean.
This hotel is perfect for Weekend staycation at the hearts of Kuala Lumpur. Nice bath tub, cozy bed, fantastic breakfast and you are just 10mins walking distance to KLCC. Definitely will come again.
Room was huge and clean. Breakfast was also good with lots of food

Made the right choice by having my wedding reception here two years ago and decided to come back for a stay last night due to a water cut back home. Was upgraded to a bigger room, staff were very welcoming and friendly. Room was extremely clean and well-equipped, comfy clean linen and a spotless bathroom. Service is still top notch. Will definitely return to stay should the need arises!

reviews.review_title: I was good but not as great as expected”
reviews.review_comment: Swimming pool is so-so, not scenery worthy. Bath tub was dirty, water was yellowish. Other than that all good, breakfast buffet is superb.

reviews.review_title: Great room, staff and location. Breakfast and room facilities could be improved.”
reviews.review_comment: Some of the breakfast food was too salty but choices were great. Breakfast area is too packed. Shower is hard to balance cold and hot water. TV is not "smart".
Comfort room, excellent breakfast and excellent service are the 3 words I can give to this hotel.

Overall was good its a matter of on how to reach the hotel a bit difficult if youre not familiar with KL area. The breakfast was good and facilities everything was good. Definitely will come back and really hope IHG can be like Marriot Bonvoy that can offer a good price and facilities for their customers. Thank you.
great value for money. excellent breakfast. love it
Spacious room Good Breakfast Value for money

During my one night stay, my children aged 22, 21, 19 & 17 were attacked by asthma. They cannot sleep at night. After leaving the Hotel they were ok but need to be brought to clinic for nebuliser. I believe the hotel management need to clean the air ventilator and the carpets immediately.

hotels.name: Somerset Damansara Uptown Petaling Jaya
hotels.address: No 2A, Jalan SS 21/37, Petaling Jaya, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 47400

reviews.review_comment: Best new experienve for my whole family
The sink / shower drainage was clogged and very slow-flowing; there was also no proper notification of gym staggered opening hours, and many other areas that could be improved on
Near shopping center, around there a lot of nice food, 7-11, family mart, ETC
good location. walking distance to shop lot where there's alot F&B and a mall nearby.

Stayed in room 1110. Wasn't thrilled with the room. Room wasn't cleaned well, had cobwebs on the ceiling, shower outlet was blocked so water wasn't draining fast, room aircond seemed to be not working. Even with 20 degrees celcius, the room was warm. Some light bulbs were not working.
Value for money
Comfortable stay with 1 bedroom apartment, furnished with basic cooking utensil and spacious living and bed room.
beautiful room, clean, very comfortable will definitely come again
Definitely a good staycation and getaway during the Covid season - while much of the facilities were closed, the location is definitely close by for food.
I love the whole studio/soho design because it doesn't gave me a typical cubical hotel room
Cleanliness,spacious & convenient is near to shopping mall.
Room was okay, but difficulties on the parking as i need to park at the mall side and having problem to check out from the parking

Very nice place to stay but The breakfast is not much of a variety. If you are looking for a place that you can stay and have a good in room dining & best breakfast than this is not the right place. I was hoping on the room service menu & breakfast will be great. I put high expectations on it. Instead for the room service there’s plenty of menu but only 2 is available at 6pm when i arrived on my first day. Luckily there’s a lot of stores downstairs. Cleanliness is superb and staff is okay. Only the breakfast menu and room service rated 0/5.
Gonna repeat at this place. Clean, nice & i really like it. But there’s no iron provided
Recommended Somerset hotel , Picture same as reality ~ Would come back again next time !!
The hotel has amazing and helpful staff; when the aircond didn't work well in my room they fixed it really quickly. Grateful for the quick service.

reviews.review_title: Not the best but good location”
reviews.review_comment: Booked the 2 bedroom. Cleanliness was so so. Called room service numerous times but no one answered. It’s convenient as it’s above Starling Mall
All good but AC abit warm

reviews.review_title: Great location, convenience, good value, can be cleaner”
reviews.review_comment: Great location, convenience with many eateries and shop, good value, can be cleaner - toilet and beddings
the bathroom was not well maintain.
Spacious Room, clean and bright (a lot of sunlight). Near to few good shopping area (short driving distance). Bit complicated parking ticket system.
Pro: able to check in early, centrally located. Cons: not pleased with the cleanliness of the room. Very dusty.
Overall is good...location is good... food is everywhere ... clean n hygiene... staff are friendly...

reviews.review_title: First choice accommodation when staying in PJ”
reviews.review_comment: We love our stay in Somerset Uptown. Room is awesome, location is excellent, ample parking lots, lots of food choices within walking distance and many more good points.

reviews.review_title: Good location and value for money but to improve on cleanliness ”
reviews.review_comment: Only setback was that some of the kitchen utensils were sticky and the bed and pillow covers were not fresh. Also should provide a kitchen rag to clean up. But love the location. The staff were friendly and helpful. My second time staying here with family. Will continue to recommend.

reviews.review_title: front desk should have more welcoming gesture”
reviews.review_comment: the breakfast just okay. dont expect more
Nice
I really enjoy staying at Somerset Uptown PJ, as the hotel is still so new, and you feel safe and relax in the room without any disturb.

reviews.review_title: Can do with some detail cleaning ”
reviews.review_comment: Greasy hand and finger smudges everywhere, rooms require detail cleaning, signs of wear are starting to show. White stains and dirt marks on upholstery, cushions and rugs are a put off. Parking is ample and you are connected to a mall which is great. Otherwise it’s good, will return for the right rates.
If you like apartment style hotel this is the good choice for you. It is spacious and clean.

reviews.review_title: Convenient location just next to the mall”
reviews.review_comment: Pros: Fast check in , spacious hotel with affordable price. Enjoy our stays here. Cons: air conditioner not cold enough.
Overall good experience with nice room provided. Minus the long check in process and waiting time.

reviews.review_title: Best Hotel for money in the Petaling Jaya area”
reviews.review_comment: Conveniently located and also attached to a mall. Everything needed is easily accessible from here.

Very suitable for families with young children with great access to Starling Mall and Damansara Uptown. With comfortable and spacious rooms with helpful staffs. Parking and access between Parking, Lobby and Breakfast at Sambal restaurant is a chore though. It feels like a maze going up and down with the complicated lifts and shifting between Hotel Parking and Mall parking due to inadequate parking.
Everything was fine.
Very comfortable and quite place to stay. Convenient as well as The Starling is located below the hotel.

reviews.review_title: Hotel overall is good except the staff”
reviews.review_comment: Staff need proper training
Attached to the Mall & easy for accessible retail shop.
Good location, room is big and nice but sadly very dusty and poor upkeep.

Have booked stays here multiple times and will keep coming back. Great location. Plenty of F&B options available in the area. Also has a grocery mart nearby to purchase items if you'd like to utilize the kitchen in the room. Comes with microwave and toaster. Ample parking available. Just need to validate the ticket at the reception.

Book a room on New Year Eve. Arrived around 3PM for check in and was told to wait for a while for them to check on my room and they told they will get back to me. 40minutes gone, there was no one update me. Went to the reception and demanded for some updates and was told "kejap encik". Again left unattended until 445PM. Approached them again and then they provide the key to my room. Such a horrible experience. Staff was all over the place. Many of the guests didn't get their room on time and had to wait till 430 to 445PM. Never gonna book this place again.
Good place but think need somerset need upgrade TV channels

We enjoyed our stay in the 2bedroom apartment. It is spacious and clean and with us 4 adult and 1 child we stayed comfortably. Location is good. Easy in and out to get foods. Breakfast is ok, nothing to shout about but enough to kick start your day.

reviews.review_title: Always a good place to go”
reviews.review_comment: I am a regular here. Would always come here if I needed to get away from the kids or with the kids. Facilities are great, staff is wonderful. Next to mall and lots of places to eat. My only complaint is no one helps you to carry your luggage. If you are a family of 5 you can imagine how tedious that gets when it comes to luggage. But other than that everything else is stellar

Hotel is centrally located in Uptown, next to a mall. Very easy to access food and nearby shopping malls - 1 Utama less than 5 minutes away. 1 bedroom apartment is spacious and clean, full amenities with good-sized fridge and cutlery. Had a comfortable staycation. Only complain is the limited parking for hotel guests.
nice
nice
nice

Spacious room comes with ample necessities, very comfortable stay with back at home feel. The room is clean and provided with utilities which essential for longer stay. Connecting to starling mall made its highly accessible for food and amenities. Definitely will come back again for longer stay.

The receptionist are good but the housekeeping staff is a biy lazy. The room was not clean properly and i dont think it was sanitised. The pillow stinks and there's hair everywhere even on the toilet seat when i first enter the room. The parking is too limited eventhough we can park in the mall but its troublesome to walkthru the starling's foodcourt to enter the hotel.

The location is good, just beside Starling Mall. The room is spacious and nice. However, the pillow is super thin that you can press down and touch the bed through it. You can request for other type of pillow but it's a first come first serve thing. I even have to stack 2 pillows together to sleep on my first night. The staff seems totally clueless about the 'pillow menu'. I called the reception 3 times and they don't get what I mean when I asked what type of pillow is available in the menu. The staff even brought the same thin pillow to me after that despite I repeatedly said I want other type of pillow. Also, there are way too many mirrors around that it's scary. For Chinese guests, do take note that there are full-length mirrors facing the bed for suite room. If you wanted to laze in the room and watch TV, take note that there's only AXN, NHK and local channels. Also, the image are blurry too so you might want to cast your own content instead.

checked in 3 times this year and i really like the facilities provided in the room, no need to call for iron etc everything is in the room except for drinking water you have to get it outside your room. however i noticed the water dispenser is long overdue for scheduled maintenance service

housekeeping managing definitely need a change. Waited an hour in lobby at 5pm to 6pm just to let them finish their last minute house keeping! What worse is they do not even tell us anything, we only know the problem after being angry and keep asking them a few times!

Arrived at 5pm but the staff keep us waited at lobby standing until 6pm+ without saying anything! After we are angry and ask why several times they finally said they have not done house keeping yet! Why is it not done even we checking in so late? The staff then simply gave us a room that has not clean up yet which made us more angry! At last minute the staff arrange us to another room and finally the story ends.

I do regularly have a staycation at somerset, however i do notice inconsistencies in the cleanliness of the rooms. Towel for hands & floor towel was missing stained bathrobe was stained with make up toilet was not flushed and hair was present on the seat kitchen towel was missing rubbish bag was not in the rubbish bin and until most recently which is the most shocking was that there was rubbish from the previous customer still in the cupboard Also while queuing to check in there was a complain from customer that the all the used towels were still in the toilet and it was not cleaned yet With all these, what i can see is that the standards are dropping, probably due to higher demand now as i can see you have been promoting with more ads but your cleaning service appears to not be able to keep up with the demand, and in the light of the pandemic, cleanliness is more important than ever before. I would suggest every cleaner to have a checklist of everything that needs to be done and then tick it off when they have completed the task and this needs to be reviewed when there is a complaint even when they have already ticked off the task. This is just my feedback as i always considered Somerset as a quality stay however with recent observation and experience that i've had, i cannot help but feel slightly disappointed.
Everything is perfect. It’s cheap but proper. I have no complaints. Even the breakfast was worth considering the price
Sweet
This apartment style packed a home sweet home ambience for cute little couple
I abselutly love their speaker where can connect frm your phone /ipad. You can sing along with your family. The area location near to stall for dinner. Definitely will come again.

I love everything about the place: the cleanliness, the design: every space was well designed and utilised in the room: the kitchenette, the lounge area with the tv and sofa, the mirrors, location of wardrobes. Great location with many amenities , shops, mall, food places all within walking distance. Highly recommended!
selesa
Big & cleanses room, all in good condition. Nice design & good location.

reviews.review_title: Good location, spacious room, great food nearby ”
reviews.review_comment: A very convenient location for those who dont want to drive into KL city area.

reviews.review_title: Convenient location for meetings, food n shopping”
reviews.review_comment: The 1 bedroom premier was value for money, spacious n comfortable with a big bathroom. Friendly n helpful staff. A bit confusing with the lobby being at the 6th floor, car park on 3rd floor.

reviews.review_title: Best apartment great location ,clean and spacious”
reviews.review_comment: Best apartment to stay in damasara.i will try the one in KL heard it is very nice
There were few dead insects under d basin &bed. Table top is not cleaned at all. Fungus on toilet floor side. Totally unacceptable

reviews.review_title: Room air con badly maintained and staff untrained ”
reviews.review_comment: We have never requested a room change in our life before. We generally are an easy to please customer but believe me when I say this.. We changed rooms 3 times in this visit and nonchalant staffs doesn't seem at all bothered. The first time, the front desk gave us a studio premier instead of the 1 bedroom premier that we paid for. The wrong room is 28% smaller. But I note that the air con in the smaller room is perfectly fine. The second time, there is barely any air from the air conditioning but the staff insist it was ok and told us to wait 1 hour for the air con to be up to speed. Nothing changes after that hour. Went down to the front desk to request a room change again. The third room has the same problem with the air con in the bed room but the living room air con is acceptable. Again the same staff came to check and mention all is ok. When pressed, the staff brought out a tool to measure the air speed from the air con. After not being able to get any reading on the tool, he then proceeds to take the tool apart in an attempt to fix the tool. Not sure if he is not trained to use the tool or the tool is not maintained. Up to this point, everyone is just standing around and is clearly sweating from the heat. Somehow felt sorry for him fumbling with the tool. Since the air con in the living room is acceptable, we will just keep the doors between the rooms open rather than take the trouble of changing rooms again. Yes, we are that easy, so believe me when I say the air con is barely blowing any air. The only reason this hotel is barely acceptable is because it is close to our location of interest in KL. And it is the only hotel in that location. If you don't need to be in Damansara Uptown, please consider another hotel.
Suitable for Business travellers

If you can spare that 10% more in room rate, pls do grade-up to the one-bedroom unit, especially if you're having to stay for a few days. Staff are well-trained, courteous, respectful and friendly. I used to stay in other hotels in PJ, but i have now made the Somerset Uptown my preferred choice for the last 3 trips to KL.

Lots of good food! Couple of simple stuff wish the hotel would take note: 1. Better process accessing facilities, especially access to pools or gym. Instructions should be made available around the facilities or in the rooms if you do not wish to brief customer upon check in. 2. The staff either missed housekeeping or never bother to provide the correct number of towels. Have to make multiple request for fresh towels. And try to request few hours in advanced for fresh towels as we waited up to an hour for it.

When I confronted with the front desk they said 20people. WTH! Then when asked for early check-in and late check in, they asked me what time I want. Then they said only till 1pm. Then start by saying that. Then it took me 6hrs just to a hand towel and rag. The inefficiency was very annoying.

reviews.review_title: Great facilities, with room for improvement”
reviews.review_comment: Second visit here. Pros: 1. Loved the facilities. Game room was a highlight and the reason I came again. 2. Strategic location. Close to PJ and Bangsar. 3. Parking was secure, indoor, well lit. RM 5 for 24 hours. 4. Breakfast can be converted to sahur, but had to be notified a day in advance. Cons: 1. Mask wearing was not enforced. Guests in the gameroom weren't wearing masks and even the guard that closed the game room wasn't wearing one. 2. Cleanliness could be improved. Toilet racks were rusted and bedsheets had stains. Rooms that had sofa also had stains on them and that's not a good look. Pull out sofa had crumbs. Elevator buttons were also rusting, but that could be because of reaction with sanitizer. 3. Community kitchen wasn't accessible during sahur. Couldn't use the microwave in the morning at all. Could've made an exception for ramadhan. 4. Can be quite noisy at night as its right beside a highway. All in all, for the price, will probably visit again, but would love for a bit more attention to cleanliness be paid by housekeeping.
It's very convenient! Downstairs is co-working space, and facilities provided is really good! Convenient to travel around as well.

reviews.review_title: Affordable price come with premium stay”
reviews.review_comment: With the price offered, I can enjoy premium type of room (thinker studio) it also has smart TV its come with YouTube and so on. Not to forget, complimentary water dispenser just at Lift corner, you may enjoy as much as you want but DO NOT USE PLASTIC, PLEASE USE JAR BEEN PROVIDED AT THE ROOM!! SUSTAINABILITY, I LOVE IT!!

The bathroom is dirty and there is no cleaning. bath soap is not refilled. 3. no prepare 3 in 1 coffee. as a regular customer at this hotel I just hope not to bother customers with this paid parking.

The only thing i was not happy is the room is not sound proof from the highway below, i woke up multiple times due to police/ambulance sirens in the middle of the night. reviews.review_title: Good location but missing some points”
reviews.review_comment: This place is in a good location walking distance to several restaurants places and malls - like KL Gateway, Nexus, and others. Unfortunately, while it's tucked away nicely in Bangsar South, it stands right next to the Federal Hgwy, and if your room is facing the "city view", you can hear the traffic. Stayed here for 5 nights. Took a Thinker’s Studio 2 room type. There is a little kitchenette with a kettle and 2 mugs. I did expect sachets of coffee or tea bags but it may not have been mentioned when I was booking. Basic hairdryer. Enough space for hanging some clothes and shelves. However, no iron was available and I was too lazy to ask. Also, I brought a medium suitcase but with a larger suitcase, there wouldn’t be much room in the floor to leave it open, esp since we tend to use the suitcases that have items in both sides (hardside luggage). Good sized bed, good linen and pillows and towels were good as well. With a kitchenette I did expect some cutlery and soap for washing said mugs or cutlery. Cleaners do not come to the room unless asked to do I was emptying my takeaway containers on the 1st floor which is a huge space with vending machines as well as another section for washing machines and dryers. Pricey at MYR10 per run for a wash or a dry. Overall, I would stay there again.

reviews.review_title: value of money , good location and good room with good facilities.”

This is my second trip to komune living The room is not so clean compared to my 1st trip Dusty, with lots of missing things such as no condiments/ no spoon and all The parking previously was free, but now need to pay rm5. The parking machine however is so faulty that it didnt return your balance I was already frustrated because during check up, the system was error at the self check up machine but the staff blame me saying i didnt follow the machine instructions while the problem lies at the machine who unable to accept the room key. When using the second machine, proven their system is in error and instead the staff didnot even apologize when he previously blame me due to error. When paying parking also machine didnt return balance, piss-off by the stacking issues, i just left. The pool as usual is fantastic but if maintenance issues not improved, i dont think i want to come back for another stay.

One key thing about small space is functionality. Yes I was given the upgrade from Dreamer (light colored walls 1 bed) to Thinker Two( 2 beds). I understand that they just want to provide 1 TV in in the small living area between the 2 bedrooms but even the sliding doors open the opposite side, not adjacent to the TV. I can't imagine sharing the rooms with friends where only 1 person can sit and watch TV. When my friends come to KL to visit me, I would prefer somewhere to just chill. This place is not it even if the location is fantastic

And the toilet is not clean enough. There's mold along with the shower. I hope the management can improve the cleanliness.

reviews.review_title: No toothbrush, toothpaste, cutlery, free parking ”
reviews.review_comment: - Shower area clogged and water trapped after 5 minutes. - Dusty and many bedsheet got hair. - Queued 30 min for self checkin machine but unable to check in. At the end go back to counter to check in. - No cutlery like spoon and fork provided. Disaster as we forgot to take after order Grab food and takeaway food from outside. Spoken to customer service but they said hotel no provide cutlery and komune cafe only open for breakfast hour - Pool is nice but crowded with kids - Level 1 game zone is not 24 hours, open until 10pm - Room door unable to close properly. It will beep until you go to close properly by yourself - Room TV is LG Smart TV but only support Android screen mirror. Cant even watch YouTube on a Smart TV. - Parking used to be free, now RM5

reviews.review_title: A clean & cosy hotel - value for money!”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel’s location is good. The room is clean & cosy. I stayed for 2 nights and I’m quite happy with the stay. Didn’t have time to use the facilities. Had some trouble with the internet connection on the first night but it was ok on the second. Will definitely stay here again.
Good Location and worth the price

Not really prefer this if you are looking for a spacious room. Room for 4 persons is very small. And, no towel provided, we have to request. But luckily the speed of service is ok. The parking rate is reasonable, only RM5 per entry. Overall I give 6.5 out of 10.

reviews.review_title: In room facilities wasn’t align what listed in room descriptions”
reviews.review_comment: Down side: 1. Toiletries is not provided in room which we need to buy from property 2. Cleanliness is not good, stained is visible all around the room 3. Requested for late check out during booking, but they didn’t take note of that. Called to reception they only checked and informed us only allow for 30 minutes else will be extra charges. 4. TV couldn’t support any devices mirroring Good side: 1. Mattress and pillows is comfy 2. Receptions is polite
recommended

Have been staying here for most of my trips to KL. The place is near facilities and easy to access. Food court is nearby. Clean and tidy. The only setback is that the pillows are high and not soft which made sleeping uncomfotable. Wish the management can look into this. The rest are all very satisfactory.👍
Everything was so perfect
Friendly staff! Clean and spacious room! Nice decorations lobby with spacious waiting area! Recommended
Need to pay parking everytime come in.
First time staying this room type. Nice and comfy. Recommended staying here. The parking rate a bit expensive.
Repeated stay. First time trying this room type. The toilet is unclean and no towels spotted
Very clean and customers friendly. There is self check-in/check-out kiosk.. parking before was free but now it's charged u RM5 per entry.. overall so nice n comfortable

Few problems encountered for an one-night stay: 1) Key card wasn’t able to power up the main switch. 2) Key card wasn’t able to access our room due to door locked out of battery. 3) Bad soundproof 4) Elevator super slow during check out time. However, staffs were very helpful and managed to solve the first 2 issues quickly.
Sheets with blood and coffee stains, no one will come change for you even if you asked many times. Floor sticky and room full of small flies. This place is a nightmare.
Good room
No free parking. And call room service also No coming for help . actually I stay this hotel 4 time but this time very disappointed
Nice view

The rooms are very small but clean. The pool was not clean (other travelers were not hygienic) and the lift system causes a massive waste of time so if you travel with family you will be late for everything because you have to wait up to 30 minutes for an available lift. The games room is nice -all games are free , there's a little library too. Staff are polite. Worst part - unclean pool thanks to other travelers being gross, terrible waste of time because of lifts.
Nnnnnn

Room is small and I saw some people smoke in front of my room. Not sure if the room is smoking room, but I don't think the door is soundproof (or maybe because the room is too small) so I can hear the voice outside of the door. However it's worth the price.

hotels.name: Regalia Suites & Hotel
hotels.address: No 2, Jalan Anjung Putra, Off Jalan Sultan Ismail, Chowkit / Putra WTC, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 50480

reviews.review_comment: Check in takes too long ( 1hour ) to enter our room Unfortunately at that time swimming for kids is under maintenance so unable to swim, swimming for adult but children under 12y only could enter if not can just take a pic for 5 mins and go out at the swimming area No parking free , have to pay w touch n go 👎🏻👎🏻

reviews.review_title: dirty balcony and toilet . the lift very slow ”
reviews.review_comment: not expect to much the lift very bad and slow i stay at sky view room but the toilet a bit dirty and the balcony 0/5 very dirty and have ciggarets.

1. Check in not efficient (SLOW), have to que about an 1.5 hour to check in. Waste my time. 2. Room not clean properly, still got some food leftover from previous customer. 3. Breakfast package provided was not good 4. Pool have to book and most of the time is occupied 5. Parking fee too expensive
